entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
